parameters.responseBody:
{
  "status": "Bilateral Learning Complete",
  "knowledgeDomain": "{{ $json.knowledgeDomain }}",
  "agentsEnhanced": {{ $json.agentRelevance.length }},
  "insightsGenerated": {{ $json.insights.length }},
  "learningActive": true,
  "timestamp": "{{ $json.processingTimestamp }}",
  "message": "Knowledge successfully integrated into agent capabilities. Brain trust enhanced."
}
